SiliconAngle, Extracting the Signal from the Noise, is an effort to create a different approach to new media and the future of media. We combine publishing, research, web TV network, and social data network that promotes quality content and quality people - "the Angle" on new and interesting things about the social web and new technology.  SiliconANGLE was built from the ground up using Big Data techniques to create quality content and highlight quality people.  Simply put:  To extract the signal from the noise!Our motto: we cover everything "where Computer Science meets Social Science"Expanding with growing Internet TV operation SiliconANGLE.tv #theCUBE, and data science team digging into the Internet to find insight and quality content and people.

Started as an idea as part of SiliconANGLE Media social media development where we saw the revolution of real time data in the crowd.  CrowdChat is born in the cloud - a SaaS platform changing social media to be data driven with ROI.  Next generation ad hoc cloud based software for conversations.  Growing fast.  Recently won Hot Startup Award from Aragon Research for Enterprise Group Chat software.

Product focused research on next generation emerging technology.  We focus on building zero and early stage ventures from our own research and network.  Focused on ideation, prototyping, and developing new products/ventures.  Broadband Developments develops it's own proprietary ideas and commercializes them.  In November 2008 BroadDev's model was expanded to include a group incubator - SiliconAngle Labs and few startups.Current angel funded startups:1. SiliconANGLE NetworkStatus:  Fully funded and scaling up; Very profitable; built multi million dollar in profits from zero stage with no outside funding.  2. CrowdChat Platform (formerly stealthname: VDP Finder, Inc) Status:  Angel funded; In private beta generating revenue; Product in market with blue chip social media brand marketers.  Launching in Q2 2014 3. SiliconAcademy.com; incubating a social data edu platform; Status:  Early stage not yet launched;4. Stealth analytics big data project; Status:  Product development mode; looking a crazy new predictive analytics and how it disrupts consumer interactions.New grass roots new venture research firm - Hybrid incubator linking finance, research, and a group entrepreneurial community.SiliconAngle Labs is an applied research firm and angel investment from friends.Since 2001 Broadband Developments has developed over half dozen new ventures from zero stage to revenue in the following areas:  **  Internet Infrastructure**  Enterprise Infrastructure**  Search Marketing**  Next Generation Search **  Broadband Wireless **  Web 2.0/Digital Media**  Social Media

Founder and CEO of PodTech.Network Inc (www.podtech.net) a media company dedicated to delivering podcasting for the iPod generation.  Started as the InfoTalk Podcast which became one of the most popular podcasts in Silicon Valley where I interviewed thousands of enterpreneurs and venture capitalists.  Raised $5.5 in venture capital to commercialize podcasting.  Developed a content platform for cataloging and monetizing new media.  Pioneered business, web 2.0, and social media solutions for corporations via podcasting.  Build initial blue chip client base to over 40 companies with top clients billing over $3m per year in social media solutions.   PodTech pioneered Web 2.0 online advertising video products in viral social media.  Company was part of the venture back class of 2005 (PodTech, Odeo, Podshow) of podcasting startups that failed.  Left in August of 2007 and then the company transitioned from a media platform to a video production company and was sold to LA firm in 2008.

The Hult Prize Foundation is a not-for-profit organization dedicated to launching the world's next wave of social entrepreneurs. It encourages the world's brightest business minds to compete in teams to solve the planet's biggest challenges with innovative ideas for sustainable start-up enterprises. Annual Hult Prize winners can make their ideas reality with the help of USD1 million in seed funding.College and university students are called to action to compete in one of five global regional rounds of competition. Teams of 3-4 students are charged with developing ideas for social enterprises that can conquer modern day’s most solvable global challenges.

TechTruth.org is the brainchild of SiliconANGLE Media Inc and The GroundTruth Project founders.  Cofounded by John Furrier, Dave Vellante, and Charlie Sennott as the technology section of TheGroundTruthProject.org.  TechTruth is non-profit media organization dedicated to training the next generation of journalists to produce innovative media that enlightens and informs. TechTruth is committed to narrative storytelling across media platforms, including digital, radio/podcast, television and documentary film. This ambitious non-profit initiative will create "classes" of fellows through our funded fellowship program to train and support a new generation of journalists to cover the intersection of technology and social justice, called “TechTruth.”    Fellows will go beyond the surface level of conference news to find stories that matter, exploring how technology intersects with issues of social justice.TechTruth's partner organization, GroundTruth, has supported more than 100 emerging journalists in telling the most important stories of their generation.  Join our mission.

summary: I have a Computer Science Degree and MBA.  Startup guy since 1997.  Right now I'm running two companies I recently started and funded in 2010 SiliconANGLE Media and CrowdChat Platform.  One in online converged media and another one in social business, data science, and big data.  Also, SiliconANGLE conceived and built @theCUBE a live web TV program where I've interviewed over 5,000+ industry leaders in technology with over 20 million viewers.  At the heart I'm an entrepreneur.  I love conceiving and building new products and technology at the intersection of Media and Technology; Where Computer Science meets Social Science.  Specialties: -    Intersection of Media & Technology-    Developing new startups-    Business development-    Go to market for new products-    Monetization of new disruptive technologies-    Opportunity recognition for new markets and productsMy Favorite Markets:-  Web 2.0 and Web Services-  Real Time Internet:  Blogs, Podcasting, and New "New Media"-  Search & Online Advertising -  Next Generation Ad Networks -  Broadband Wireless and Wireline
name: John Furrier
title: Cofounder & Co-CEO of SiliconANGLE Media; Executive Editor @theCUBE, Wikibon Research; Technology Contributor at Forbes
